column3: @dvitas A standard transaction is any transaction specified for use by multiple people/software. Note that in general, you should use existing standards (generally BIPs) when you have a need for their intended purpose, and if you have a new use case, write a new standard describing an appropriate way to accomplish that. Trying to design something to target IsStandardTx, which changes based on spec
@cfields can you merge this into your trivial branch?\n
Merged. These have stacked up somewhat now, ready for a rebased PR to master?\n
Yes, I think we should try that to see how it goes.\n
